userPersonas.name: Sarah - Marketing Manager
userPersonas.description: Mid-level marketing manager at a growing B2B SaaS company responsible for demand generation and brand awareness campaigns

context.environment: Open office, remote work 2 days/week, frequent meetings
context.timeConstraints: Always rushing between campaigns, quarterly deadlines
context.typicalWorkflow: Manual campaign planning in spreadsheets, multiple tool switching, lots of back-and-forth with design team

userPersonas.name: Mike - Small Business Owner
userPersonas.description: Owns a local fitness studio, handles all marketing himself with limited budget and time

context.environment: At the gym or home office, often interrupted by clients
context.timeConstraints: Extremely limited - maybe 30 minutes per week for marketing
context.typicalWorkflow: Posts on social media when he remembers, occasional email to member list

userPersonas.name: Alex - Agency Creative Director
userPersonas.description: Creative director at a mid-size marketing agency handling multiple client campaigns simultaneously

context.environment: Creative studio with team, client presentation rooms
context.typicalWorkflow: Briefing team, reviewing concepts, client presentations, lots of revisions

painPoints.title: Creative ideation takes too long
painPoints.description: Coming up with fresh campaign concepts and copy takes hours of brainstorming and research
painPoints.emotionalImpact: Frustrated, stressed about deadlines, feeling uncreative
painPoints.businessImpact: Delays campaign launches, increases cost per campaign, reduces creative quality

painPoints.title: Maintaining consistent brand voice across channels
painPoints.description: Different team members create content that doesn't align with brand guidelines
painPoints.emotionalImpact: Anxious about brand reputation, frustrated with team coordination
painPoints.businessImpact: Diluted brand messaging, confused customers, wasted budget on off-brand content

painPoints.title: No marketing expertise for small businesses
painPoints.description: Small business owners don't know marketing best practices or what makes effective campaigns
painPoints.emotionalImpact: Overwhelmed, intimidated, worried about wasting money
painPoints.businessImpact: Poor campaign performance, wasted budget, missed growth opportunities

painPoints.title: Coordinating multi-channel campaign timing
painPoints.description: Managing when content goes live across different platforms and ensuring proper sequencing
painPoints.emotionalImpact: Stressed about missing deadlines, fear of mistakes
painPoints.businessImpact: Missed launch windows, uncoordinated messaging, reduced campaign effectiveness

painPoints.title: Creating visual assets requires design skills
painPoints.description: Need graphics, videos, and visual content but lack design expertise or resources
painPoints.emotionalImpact: Frustrated with design limitations, embarrassed by amateur-looking content
painPoints.businessImpact: Higher production costs, slower campaign development, less professional brand image

userGoals.title: Launch marketing campaigns 3x faster
userGoals.description: Reduce time from campaign idea to live campaign from weeks to days
successCriteria: Less than 2 hours of manual work

userGoals.title: Ensure all campaign content aligns with brand voice
userGoals.description: Every piece of content should feel like it came from the same brand and marketing team

userGoals.title: Create effective campaigns without marketing expertise
userGoals.description: Small business owners should be able to create professional campaigns that actually work

userGoals.title: Prove marketing campaign ROI
userGoals.description: Show clear connection between marketing spend and business results

userObjectives.title: Reduce campaign production time by 70%
userObjectives.description: Cut down the time from campaign brief to live campaign launch

userObjectives.title: Improve campaign performance by 40%
userObjectives.description: Increase engagement rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates

userJobs.jobStatement: When I need to create a new marketing campaign, I want to quickly generate relevant and creative concepts, so I can focus on strategy instead of ideation
userJobs.desiredOutcome: Multiple high-quality campaign concepts generated in minutes

userJobs.jobStatement: When I create marketing content, I want to feel confident it represents my brand well, so I can maintain professional credibility
userJobs.desiredOutcome: 100% confidence that all content aligns with brand

userJobs.jobStatement: When I need to market my business, I want to feel competent and knowledgeable, so I can compete effectively with larger companies
userJobs.desiredOutcome: Feel like a marketing expert even without formal training

userBehaviors.behaviorPattern: Create campaigns at the last minute when deadlines loom
userBehaviors.implications: Need rapid campaign creation tools and templates

userBehaviors.behaviorPattern: Reuse successful campaign templates and formats
userBehaviors.implications: Provide intelligent template suggestions that evolve

userBehaviors.behaviorPattern: Small business owners primarily work from mobile devices
userBehaviors.implications: Must have excellent mobile experience and offline capabilities

mentalModels.userUnderstanding: Think of campaigns as discrete projects with start/end dates, deliverables, and team assignments
commonMisconceptions: All campaigns need the same level of complexity
More channels always equals better results
mentalModels.designImplications: Use project-based navigation and timeline visualizations

mentalModels.userUnderstanding: Brand is like a person's personality - it should be consistent and recognizable across all interactions
commonMisconceptions: Brand voice can change based on mood
Consistency means using exact same words
mentalModels.designImplications: Provide personality-based brand controls and voice examples

mentalModels.userUnderstanding: Small business owners view marketing as somewhat mysterious - some things work, others don't, without clear reasons
mentalModels.designImplications: Provide clear cause-and-effect explanations and educational guidance
